Texto: 
the patient was afebrile with normal labs.
the patient's disease was self-limiting and he improved over the course of one week.
there is a diffusely enlarged right parotid gland.
parotitis
siloadenitis
infectious parotitis
the patient is a 9 year old male with 2 day history of progressive right sided painful facial swelling.
